answerText: mutations[10] This test is used to see if unknown mutagens cause indels or frameshifts. A mutagen with known effect is applied to a bacterial culture, and the unknown mutagen is then given to the bacteria to see if they revert to a normal phenotype.
heading: DEES |2014 | McGill + Penn B | 13 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Two classifications of these occurrences are indel or frameshift.  [10] Name these events in which the DNA sequence of an cell is changed.
